Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Milestones.Committee: Tourism, Parks, Arts And Sports Development

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO TOURISM, PARKS, ARTS AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to a feasibility study and report on the potential reestablishment of the empire state games
Summary: Directs the commissioner of parks, recreation and historic preservation, in conjunction with the department of economic development, to conduct a feasibility study and report on the potential reestablishment of the empire state games.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to a feasibility study and report on the potential reestablishment of the empire state games
